title: 'Journey To Jihad' Tells Story Of Belgian Teenager Who Joined Islamic State
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish interviews Ben Taub, author of the New Yorker article, "Journey to Jihad," about a teen who converted to Islam, was radicalized, and later joined the self-declared Islamic State.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
